brand.description: Complete fleet management platform for transport companies

HomePage.titleHero: Discover the most simple and intuitive Limo Software in the world.
HomePage.paragraphHero: Fleetmo is the most advanced management system for Limo Business in the world, add, manage and assign your rides. Receive directly from your providers and distribute them to your collaborators and dedicated app for your drivers.
HomePage.introductionTitle: Receive, manage, assign, and monitor the status of your rides—all from a single platform.

feature1.title: Upload or Add Your Rides
feature1.description: Easily upload multiple bookings at once or manually add individual rides directly from your smartphone or tablet. Manage your schedule effortlessly and keep your operations running smoothly.

feature2.title: Real-Time Flight Status Verification
feature2.description: Instantly access live flight information, including delays, early arrivals, or cancellations. Stay informed and proactively manage your transportation rides to offer a reliable customer experience.

feature3.title: Exchange Rides with Other Suppliers
feature3.description: Conveniently exchange, transfer, or share bookings with your network of trusted partner suppliers. Optimize your capacity, reduce downtime, and enhance collaboration within your business ecosystem.

feature4.title: Manage Vouchers and No-Shows
feature4.description: Efficiently handle vouchers, cancellations, amendments, and no-shows directly from the application. Streamline your administrative tasks, reduce paperwork, and ensure accurate records for easy reporting.

feature5.title: Dedicated App for Your Drivers
feature5.description: Efficiently handle vouchers, cancellations, amendments, and no-shows directly from the application. Streamline your administrative tasks, reduce paperwork, and ensure accurate records for easy reporting.

feature6.title: Real-Time Ride Status Tracking
feature6.description: Gain complete visibility of your rides through continuous real-time tracking. Monitor service progress, anticipate delays, and respond quickly to any situation to guarantee exceptional service reliability.

feature7.title: No-Show System
feature7.description: If a customer doesn't show up, the driver can take a photo as proof. Our integrated No-Show System automatically captures and records the exact GPS coordinates, date, and time directly on the photo, updating the service status accordingly.

feature8.title: Transaction Management System
feature8.description: Comprehensive financial tracking and billing management. Monitor payments, generate invoices, track revenue, and manage financial relationships with suppliers and drivers from a centralized dashboard.

feature9.title: Advanced Driver Management
feature9.description: Complete driver lifecycle management including performance analytics, certification tracking, scheduling optimization, and detailed reporting. Streamline onboarding, monitor driver efficiency, and ensure compliance.

feature10.title: AI-Powered Smart Assignment
feature10.description: Intelligent service assignment system that automatically matches rides to the most suitable drivers based on location, availability, performance history, and customer preferences using advanced machine learning algorithms.

howItWorks.title: Schedule your daily driver rides in 4 easy steps.

step1.title: Upload or add your rides
step1.description: You can upload all your rides directly through the app using a dedicated form, or you can use our template to upload them all at once.

step2.title: Add your drivers
step2.description: Add your drivers to automatically create accounts for them, enabling them to easily receive and manage the bookings you assign.

step3.title: Assign Rides to your drivers
step3.description: Assign rides individually or in bulk to your drivers, and monitor the progress and status of each ride in real-time.

conclusion.title: Conclusion of the Ride
conclusion.description: You can upload all your rides directly through the app using a dedicated form, or you can use our template to upload them all together.

status.textCompleted: Once the driver uploads the signed voucher, the service status automatically updates to completed. Easily confirm the successful completion of your rides in real time.
status.textCancelled: If a customer doesn't show up, the driver can take a photo as proof. The integrated No-Show System automatically logs evidence, updating the service status accordingly.

driverApp.title: Dedicated app to manage rides perfectly.

feature1.title: Daily Rides View
feature1.description: Add your drivers—this automatically creates accounts for them, allowing them to receive and manage assigned rides.

feature2.title: Live Flight Status
feature2.description: Manage your rides, assign and verify the status of your rides from a single platform.

feature3.title: Advanced ride status management
feature3.description: Manage your rides, assign and verify the status of your rides from a single platform.

feature4.title: Integrated Proof No-Show system
feature4.description: Manage your rides, assign and verify the status of your rides from a single platform.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Simple and transparent. Choose the plan that fits your business.

features.feature1: Add single Service or Bulk system

comingSoon.title: We are working hard to make it better.

box1.title: Live Tracking
box1.description: Keep an eye on every ride in real time, receiving instant location updates, status notifications, and performance analytics. Ensure timely pickups, proactive adjustments, and superior customer experiences.

box2.title: Marketplace
box2.description: Easily publish your available rides on the marketplace to facilitate quick trading among providers. Optimize fleet utilization, monetize unused rides, and efficiently match demand with available resources.

box3.title: AI Integration
box3.description: Harness the power of artificial intelligence to fully automate daily ride assignments to drivers, instantly reassign trips if a driver cancels or misses a service, and optimize schedules dynamically—saving time, reducing manual effort, and maximizing operational efficiency.

testimonial.text1: With over 8 years of experience in the limo service industry, I recognized the need for a technological solution that could streamline and automate the complexities of managing my daily operations. Unable to find an existing platform specifically tailored to the unique demands of this business, I decided to create an advanced, practical, and user-friendly tool.
testimonial.text2: The result is a specialized platform designed by limo service professionals for limo service professionals, built to simplify day-to-day management, enhance operational efficiency, and deliver exceptional client experiences. Today, I am proud to offer this solution to any company seeking to elevate their limousine rides, automate workflows, reduce errors, and maximize profitability.
testimonial.name: Emanuele Campanari

hero.title: Scale your fleet operations with FleetMo
hero.subtitle: Join the FleetMo supplier network as an operational partner managing local fleets and drivers in the comprehensive assignment chain

introduction.title: Complete fleet management tools for suppliers
introduction.subtitle: Access powerful features designed specifically for fleet operators who coordinate drivers and execute services from provider partners

feature1.title: Incoming Rides Management
feature1.description: Receive and manage rides assigned by provider partners with priority-based queue and acceptance controls

feature2.title: AI Driver Assignment
feature2.description: Intelligent assignment system considering working hours, availability, vehicle matching and workload balancing

feature3.title: Supplier Chain Network
feature3.description: Sub-contract to other supplier partners through the friends system with full chain tracking

feature4.title: Driver Fleet Management
feature4.description: Complete driver profile management with working hours, compensation models and performance tracking

feature5.title: Real-Time GPS Tracking
feature5.description: Live driver tracking with Mapbox integration and operational dashboard for emergency management

feature6.title: Commission Management
feature6.description: Automatic commission calculation with support for salary and commission-based compensation models

benefits.title: Advanced Tools for Suppliers
benefits.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions to manage assigned services and optimize daily operations with maximum precision.

incoming.title: Incoming Services
incoming.subtitle: Intuitive management of services assigned by providers.
incoming.description: Receive, evaluate, and manage all services assigned by providers. Easily accept or reject services, update service details, and efficiently coordinate your incoming queue to maximize your company's operational efficiency.

assignment.title: Driver Assignment
assignment.subtitle: Quickly assign services to drivers manually or using intelligent AI automation.
assignment.description: Use our advanced interface to directly assign services to your drivers or leverage intelligent algorithms (Pro Plan) to automatically balance workloads, resolve conflicts, and optimize fleet utilization.

fleet.title: Fleet Management
fleet.subtitle: Comprehensive control of your driver and vehicle management.
fleet.description: Administer driver profiles, manage availability and working hours, and coordinate vehicle assignments. Utilize advanced tools for performance monitoring, commission management, and continuous team training.

dashboard.title: Operational Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Real-time visualization of operations and GPS tracking.
dashboard.description: A centralized, real-time view to monitor active services, track driver positions, and manage emergencies. Optimize dispatch processes and ensure an immediate response to operational needs.

howItWorks.title: Your journey as a FleetMo supplier
howItWorks.subtitle: From registration to fleet optimization, discover how FleetMo transforms your operations

step1.title: Join the Network
step1.description: Register as a supplier partner and connect with provider companies in your operational area. Complete your profile and fleet details to start receiving ride assignments.

step2.title: Receive & Manage Rides
step2.description: Get ride assignments from provider partners through our incoming rides dashboard. Accept, prioritize and manage your queue with full control over your operational capacity.

step3.title: Assign to Drivers
step3.description: Use our intelligent assignment system to match rides with your drivers. Leverage AI optimization or manual control to ensure perfect driver-service matching.

step4.title: Track & Optimize
step4.description: Monitor real-time GPS tracking of your fleet, manage compensation models, and access detailed analytics to continuously optimize your operations and profitability.

conclusion.title: Conclusion of the Ride
conclusion.description: You can upload all your rides directly through the app using a dedicated form, or you can use our template to upload them all together.

status.textCompleted: Once the driver uploads the signed voucher, the service status automatically updates to completed. Easily confirm the successful completion of your rides in real time.
status.textCancelled: If a customer doesn't show up, the driver can take a photo as proof. The integrated No-Show System automatically logs evidence, updating the service status accordingly.

pricing.title: Choose your supplier plan
pricing.subtitle: Two comprehensive plans designed specifically for supplier operations with all the tools you need

standard.name: Standard
standard.description: Complete supplier toolkit for fleet management

cta.subtitle: Join thousands of suppliers who have already chosen FleetMo to expand their business

hero.title: Lead the fleet management revolution
hero.subtitle: Coordinate your entire transport operation with FleetMo's advanced platform. Manage clients, suppliers, and drivers from a single dashboard with real-time tracking and AI-powered optimization.

introduction.title: Complete coordination platform
introduction.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your transport business efficiently and scale your operations with confidence.

clients.title: Client Management
clients.description: Receive and manage client requests with complete service creation, calendar management, and bulk upload capabilities via CSV.

coordination.title: Service Coordination
coordination.description: Orchestrate the entire service chain from client request to delivery with full tracking and audit trail of all operations.

network.title: Supplier Network
network.description: Manage your partner network with business relationship tools, partnership requests, and performance monitoring.

tracking.title: Fleet Monitoring
tracking.description: Real-time GPS dashboard with Mapbox integration for complete fleet visibility and live driver position tracking.

analytics.title: Business Intelligence
analytics.description: Advanced analytics with operational metrics, ROI tracking, supplier performance reports, and trend analysis for strategic growth.

ai.title: AI-Powered Optimization
ai.description: Intelligent algorithms for automatic service assignment, route optimization, and predictive analytics for maximum efficiency.

benefits.title: Professional Tools for Providers
benefits.subtitle: Dedicated interfaces to efficiently manage every aspect of your transportation business.

assignment.title: Assignment Modal
assignment.subtitle: Dedicated interface for bulk or individual assignment of services to supplier partners with price negotiation and budget management.
assignment.description: The Assignment Modal allows you to quickly assign services—individually or in bulk—to your supplier partners. With a clear interface, you can define budgets, negotiate prices, and effortlessly track the entire assignment chain.

dashboard.title: Provider Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: All your operations under real-time control.
dashboard.description: Access operational metrics and advanced analytics from a centralized dashboard. Monitor performance, track the status of active services, and analyze your supplier network's efficiency. Quickly identify critical issues and opportunities to streamline processes and improve profitability.

network.title: Supplier Network
network.subtitle: Easily manage and expand your supplier partnership network.
network.description: An intuitive interface for managing your supplier network: send collaboration requests, monitor partner performance, and optimize geographic coverage. Strategically expand your network to ensure the highest service quality for your customers.

tracking.title: Live Tracking
tracking.subtitle: Real-time fleet monitoring with advanced GPS tracking.
tracking.description: Monitor the exact position of every vehicle in your fleet in real time, thanks to Mapbox integration. Handle emergencies, keep track of active services, and consult historical routes for complete and reliable operational control.

howItWorks.title: How providers operate
howItWorks.subtitle: From client request to service completion, manage your entire operation with maximum efficiency and transparency.

create.title: Service Creation
create.description: Receive client requests and create complete services with all details including pickup, dropoff, passengers, and flight information.

assign.title: Supplier Assignment
assign.description: Assign services to your supplier partner network with price negotiation, budget setting, and complete chain tracking.

monitor.title: Operation Monitoring
monitor.description: Monitor service execution in real-time with GPS tracking, status updates, and direct communication with the field.

conclusion.title: Conclusion of the Ride
conclusion.description: You can upload all your rides directly through the app using a dedicated form, or you can use our template to upload them all together.

status.textCompleted: Once the driver uploads the signed voucher, the service status automatically updates to completed. Easily confirm the successful completion of your rides in real time.
status.textCancelled: If a customer doesn't show up, the driver can take a photo as proof. The integrated No-Show System automatically logs evidence, updating the service status accordingly.

pricing.title: Choose your provider plan
pricing.subtitle: Flexible plans designed for transport companies of all sizes, from startups to large enterprises.
pricing.note: All plans include unlimited supplier connections and driver assignments.

cta.title: Ready to revolutionize your transport business?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of transport companies that have already chosen FleetMo to optimize their operations and scale their business.
